DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to obtain blood samples from patients who are or were participants in any Alcon AL-3789 clinical trial. Association will be conducted to search for genetic markers in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Collection of Blood Specimens From Patients in AL-3789 Studies for Elevated Intraocular Pressure (IOP)
DOC.criteria: Patient must be currently or previously enrolled in Alcon clinical study and received AL3789 Age related
